title: Ex-Wife Stop
overview: Adapted from the novel "The Wife Don't Run Before You Get Married" (婚入心扉之前妻别跑) by Sheng Duo (盛朵).Sheng Group CEO Sheng Nanfang is forced to marry an ordinary girl Su Shaoyan. But due to a series of misunderstandings, he breaks her heart. After the divorce, Sheng Nanfang realizes that he has lost his true love. But is Su Shaoyan ready to give their feelings a second chance?
